staffArray.name: John McDaniel
staffArray.description: Pastor John McDaniel is the Senior Pastor of our church. With many years of preaching experience and a deep love for the Lord, Pastor John consistently teaches the Bible with a passion.

staffArray.name: Lewis Martin
staffArray.description: Lewis is a deacon, runs the building and grounds team, serves on the finance team, leads various LifeGroups and makes sure sermons are recorded and posted each week!

staffArray.name: Debbie Stone
staffArray.description: Debbie has served as our dedicated church secretary for many years.
